channel.title: I need help with my custom items!
channel.description:
hey i need help with customs. i got every custom almost but i changed the Id of some godswords but they never changed now i dont know the real id for them but the strange is that the 3 first gs'es changes at once.
and when i attack i cant se the custom please help me so i can se the custom when i attack.
third (last) when i wear it i look at my weapon option ther it says (UNKNOWN WEAPON ITEMID *****) how to change it like it says weapon: bandos whip instead of (UNKNOWN WEAPON ITEMID *****)
thats all thx

item.title: I need help with my custom items!
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

ok to change the id you need to change from class_8.java in you client files
to make them visible while attacking you need to assigne an emote to them by:
go in client .java and search for public int GetWepAnim() {
scroll down theer should be like this if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) // whip { return 1658; } copy and paste and existing one and eneter the wepon details and for a deff emote scroll down and serch if whip its 1658 and slash 451 etc
for the third one you need to go into iteams .cfg and add your wepon

item = itemid itemname exemine 500000000 500000000 500000000 29 39 29 -15 0 181 193 198 -3 182 30 30

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my custom items!
